title: 혼합 가정법 연습
description: 과거와 현재를 연결하는 혼합 가정법으로 복잡한 시간적 관계를 표현합니다. MIXED-CONDITIONAL-PRACTICE 패턴을 연습합니다.
examples: If I had saved more money, I would be traveling now.
If she were more confident, she would have gotten the job.
If we had launched the product earlier, we would be market leaders today.
learning_points: 과거 행동이 현재에 미치는 영향의 가정적 표현

sentences.kr: 돈을 더 많이 저축했다면 지금 여행을 하고 있을 텐데요.
sentences.en: If I had saved more money, I would be traveling now.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 더 자신감이 있었다면 그 직장을 얻었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If she were more confident, she would have gotten the job.

sentences.kr: 제품을 더 일찍 출시했다면 오늘날 시장 선도업체가 되어 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had launched the product earlier, we would be market leaders today.

sentences.kr: 대학에서 더 열심히 공부했다면 지금 더 좋은 직장에 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If I had studied harder in college, I would have a better job now.

sentences.kr: 그가 더 신중했다면 그런 실수를 하지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If he were more cautious, he wouldn't have made that mistake.

sentences.kr: 그 당시에 다른 결정을 했다면 지금 다른 인생을 살고 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had made different decisions then, we would be living different lives now.

sentences.kr: 회사가 더 혁신적이었다면 지금도 경쟁력을 유지하고 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If the company were more innovative, it would have maintained its competitiveness.

sentences.kr: 기술 투자를 더 했다면 지금 이 분야에서 선두를 달리고 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If they had invested more in technology, they would be leading in this field now.
